item.title: Kurnool-Raichur Inter-State Highway Turns Into a Death Trap: Traffic Halted, Locals Demand Immediate Action
item.description:
<![CDATA[Gadwal: The inter-state highway connecting Kurnool and Raichur has turned into a nightmare for commuters, especially in the stretch between Mittadoddi and Balgera villages in Gattu Mandal. The condition of this vital road deteriorated drastically following heavy rains on Wednesday night, which led to severe damage of the already crumbling road infrastructure.
On Thursday morning, two lorries got stuck in the deep slush, completely halting vehicular movement along the route. This incident highli...]]>
item.author: M Veeresh
